welcomesurvey-question-mailinglist-label: Achọrọ m inweta ntụziaka na email etu m ga-esi bido mmezi.
welcomesurvey-question-mailinglist-help: Biko mata na ndị mebere ndeba nziga ozi a bụ MailChimp, nke pụtara na ihe na achịkwa MailChimp iji ndebanye gị rụọ ọrụ bụ [https://www.intuit.com/privacy/statement/ Privacy Policy] and [https://mailchimp.com/legal/terms/Terms Terms of Service].
